# menbayes

<!-- badges: start -->
[![R-CMD-check](https://github.com/gerardlab/menbayes/actions/workflows/R-CMD-check.yaml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/gerardlab/menbayes/actions/workflows/R-CMD-check.yaml)
<!-- badges: end -->

Provides a suite of methods for Bayesian tests for Mendelian segregation in experimental autopolyploid populations. This is under different assumptions of meiosis.

## Installation

You can install the development version of menbayes from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("gerardlab/menbayes")
```
